name: Patagonia Fjord Lightweight Flannel Shirt - Men's
description: Your new favourite flannel shirt. Organic cotton and a relaxed fit make a shirt that's warm, timeless, and durable enough to take on whatever the road throws at you.Midweight organic cotton flannel twill wears well.Single chest pocket is perfect for some cash and sunnies.Shirttail hem is tuckable should things take a turn for the fancy.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.
